title: Lucy Powell – 2022 Comments on Matt Hancock Going on I’m a Celebrity
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Lucy Powell, the Labour MP for Manchester Central, on Twitter on 1 November 2022.
content:
While his constituents need help with the cost of living and want answers about the economy his party has just tanked, Matt Hancock is jetting off to Australia to eat kangaroo testicles. Sums them up really.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners

No doubt he’ll be voted off first, as this never ends well for MPs.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
